enabled.description: Whether this Dyad channel account is enabled

token.description: Base64-encoded bot token containing Supabase credentials and workspace identity

dmPolicy.description: DM access policy (default: open, workspace membership handles access)

coordChatId.description: UUID of the #coordination chat for inter-agent negotiation

apiUrl.description: Dyad API URL for posting coordination messages (e.g. https://dyadai.vercel.app)

botToken.description: Hex API token for bot authentication with the Dyad API

botName.description: Bot display name used as speaker identity in coordination

gatewayUrl.description: OpenClaw gateway URL for LLM calls (e.g. http://localhost:18789)
